Column.Name: Account Exists
Column.Formula: IF( DB_LOOKUP("Username", "sys.Roles", HASH("Username", [Username], "Type", "GUEST")) <> NULL, TRUE, FALSE )

Column.Name: Organisation Username
Company Name - Person Name - Position
Column.Formula: [Name] & IF([Position] <> NULL, " (" & [Position] & IF([Company Name] <> NULL, " at " & [Company Name]) & ")" )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Global Settings

Label.Text: Which vendor is this contact associated with?

Binding.Expression: AND( [User is Vendor] <> TRUE, [Vendor RecordID] = NULL, HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Owns Integrated Module - Contracts") = TRUE )
AND( [User is Vendor] <> TRUE, [Vendor Account Creation Enabled] = TRUE, [Accounts Management Visible] <> TRUE, [RecordID] > 0 )

UpdateUser.Description: Make new account child of organisation account

Label.Text: The email address of the contact you are creating an account for. Creating an account will not send an email.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Account Exists] <> TRUE, [Accounts Management Visible] = TRUE )

UpdateUser.Description: Make new account child of organisation account

Label.Text: This is one-time access login link. Once the user has accessed the system for the first time they will change their password and this link will no longer work.
This is the name that the contact will login to the system with.

Binding.Expression: AND( [Account Exists] = TRUE, [Accounts Management Visible] = TRUE )
AND( [Account Exists] = TRUE, [Accounts Management Visible] = TRUE )
AND( [User is Vendor] <> TRUE, [Vendor Account Creation Enabled] = TRUE, [Delete] <> TRUE, [RecordID] > 0 )

Label.Text: "You are attempting to delete Contact #" & [RecordID] & ". You cannot restore or recover a record once deleted."

Binding.Expression: "You are attempting to delete Contact #" & [RecordID] & ". You cannot restore or recover a record once deleted."

Label.Text: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?

TextCriterion.Text: (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

CASE
-- Check if user is in Everyone or Read All WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is vendor WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN (STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0)
ELSE FALSE END

CASE --Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' THEN TRUE
--Check if user is vendor on parent
WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Accounts' THEN ( STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0

(STEP TO [Contract] ON ( [To].[Vendor RecordID] = [To].[Vendor RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] = 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] ) ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
(STEP TO [Vendor] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username] AND [Vendor RecordID] = [To].[RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0)) > 0
